bdglue2.meta.transaction

Class DownstreamOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdglue2.meta.transaction.DownstreamOperation

  • public class DownstreamOperation
extends Object
    The data that represents the operation type for this record. If this is database "change data", then will will represent database CRUD operations (insert, update, delete). If BDGlue is being used to load data from somewhere, then the type should be set to "INSERT" for insert.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DownstreamOperation

        public DownstreamOperation(String opType,
                           String timestamp,
                           String position,
                           String userTokens,
                           String txId,
                           DownstreamTableMetaData tableMeta)
        Create an operation to pass along for processing from the supplied meta data.
        Parameters:
        opType - the database operation type (insert, update, delete)
        timestamp - the transaction timestamp
        position - the relative position of this operation
        userTokens - the user tokens associated with this operation
        txId - the transaction identifier
        tableMeta - metadata for the table to which this operation applies

    • Method Detail

      • getOpType

        public String getOpType()
        Get the operation type that was passed into the constructor. This operation type is used downstream in BDGlue to assist with applying the data when interacting directly with a target. It is also passed along as metadata for downstream use or audit/historical logging.
        Returns:
        the SQL operation type (INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE)

      • getOpTypeId

        public int getOpTypeId()
        Get the operation type as an integer that may be more efficient in case statements downstream.
        Returns:
        the operation ID as an integer

      • getTxId

        public String getTxId()
        Get the transaction ID that was passed into the constructor. This value is passed along as metadata for downstream use or audit/historical logging.
        Returns:
        the transaction ID

      • getTimeStamp

        public String getTimeStamp()
        Get the transaction timestamp that was passed into the constructor. It is only passed along as received and not used directly by BDGlue.
        Returns:
        the timestamp of this transaction as a String

      • getPosition

        public String getPosition()
        Get the relative position of this operation from the source. It is only passed along as received and not used by BDGlue.
        Returns:
        the relative position of this operation as a String

      • addColumn

        public void addColumn(DownstreamColumnData col)
        Add information pertaining to a column to this operation.
        Parameters:
        col - column info

      • addBefore

        public void addBefore(DownstreamColumnData col)
        Add before image data pertaining to a column to this operation.
        Parameters:
        col - column info

      • isDataChanged

        public boolean isDataChanged()
        Compares the before and after images of update operations and returns true if all of the column values in the after image (which may not be a complete column list) DO NOT match the corresponding values in the before image.
        Returns:
        true if the data has changed.

      • getRowKey

        public String getRowKey()
        Create a contcatenation of the key columns into a single String, separating each value from the one preceding it with a '/'. This is a simple implementation and assumes no slashes in the data.
        Returns:
        a "key" as a String

      • getUserTokens

        public String getUserTokens()
        Get any runtime supplied meta data. This is essentially a free form string of information. In GoldenGate parlance, this is meta information that is passed along with a record, represented as a comma delimited list of name=value pairs.
        Returns:
        the user tokens for this operation

      • getTableMeta

        public DownstreamTableMetaData getTableMeta()
        Get the table meta data that corresponds to this operation.
        Returns:
        the meta data for this table

      • getTableName

        public String getTableName()
        Get the short table name to which this operation pertains.
        Returns:
        the short table name (w/o schema name)

      • getLongTableName

        public String getLongTableName()
        Get the long table name to which this operation pertains.
        Returns:
        the long table name (schema.table)

      • getKeyName

        public String getKeyName()
        Get the table name to which this operation pertains and which is used as a key to locate the meta data.
        Returns:
        the table name used as a key in the meta data map (schema.table)

      • getColumns

        public ArrayList<DownstreamColumnData> getColumns()
        Get the column information associated with this operation and return it as an ArrayList.
        Returns:
        the column data as a List

      • getBefores

        public ArrayList<DownstreamColumnData> getBefores()
        Get the before image column information associated with this operation and return it as an ArrayList.
        Returns:
        the column data as a List

      • getOpMetadata

        public Map<String,String> getOpMetadata()
        Get the metadata column data for this operation as configured in the properties file.
        Returns:
        The metadata as a Map.

      • getMetadataCols

        public Set<String> getMetadataCols()
        Get the metadata column names as configured in the properties file.
        Returns:
        The metadata as a Map.
